text: Hemibagrus microphthalmus is a species of catfish found in the Irrawaddy, Sittang and Salween rivers of India, Myanmar and Thailand. ==References== == External links == *http://www.fishbase.org/summary/13307 Category:Bagridae Category:Catfish of Asia Category:Freshwater fish of Asia Category:Fish of India Category:Fish of Myanmar Category:Fish of Thailand Category:Irrawaddy River Category:Fish described in 1877
title: Hemibagrus microphthalmus
